section.63: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Hisham's father:Khadija died three years before the Prophet (ï·º) departed to Medina. He stayed there for two years or so and then he married `Aisha when she was a girl of six years of age, and he consumed that marriage when she was nine years old
